Available with chicken or sausage. Order Now New! Flavors for Winter Comfort is served this winter. Sip into the season with handcrafted cocktails. Try the Winter Spice Sangria — a bold twist with Bulleit Bourbon, rosemary honey syrup, pomegranate, orange juice, and Bonizio Rosso wine. Enjoy the Wood-Fire Old Fashioned with Maker’s Mark, bitters, and cherry. Or sip the Espresso Martini with Tito’s, espresso liqueur, and cold brew. Plan Your Night Chocolate Hazelnut Torte A rich chocolate torte with a hazelnut crumble topping over chocolate sauce, topped with chocolate drizzled vanilla ice cream. Garnished with walnut brittle and fresh mint Order Now Rigatoni Al Forno Rigatoni pasta oven-baked with our tomato cream sauce, romano, parmesan and goat cheese, topped with mozzarella. Enjoy the Wood-Fire Old Fashioned with Maker’s Mark, bitters, and cherry. Or sip the Espresso Martini with Tito’s, espresso liqueur, and cold brew. Garnished with walnut brittle and fresh mint Order Now Catering Done Right Elevate your catering with Carrabba's Catering! The perfect way to enjoy large-party portions of your favorite hand-prepared dishes for any event. ORDER NOW Get Offers and Rewards Like us on Facebook Follow us on Instagram Get to know us on Tiktok Frequently Asked Questions Do you have vegan/vegetarian options? We do have a delicious Vegan and Vegetarian menu to choose from. Please use the following link to find it: https://www.carrabbas.com/nutrition Do you have a Gluten Free menu? Yes. Please visit our website at and enter your city and state, or zip code in the search box provided. View a menu by clicking on "more info" and then "download a menu" and our Gluten Free offerings will be marked with GF. www.carrabbas.com Where can I add a missing visit for Dine Rewards? Please visit and click "Add a Visit." Enter the phone number associated with your Dine Rewards account and complete the form to have your credit manually applied. If you no longer have the receipt, please contact the restaurant directly and they will be happy to help you locate it. https://www.dine-rewards.com/ Do you have outdoor seating? Many of our restaurants have patio seating. Please contact your local Carrabba's to see if outdoor dining is available. Do you have a Kids menu? Yes, we do have a menu for kids 10 and under. Click here to view the Kids menu Give The Gift Of Carrabba's BUY NOW About Carrabba's Italian Grill North Charleston, SC Offering authentic Italian cuisine passed down from our founders' family recipes, Carrabba's Italian Grill® uses only the best ingredients to prepare fresh and handmade dishes cooked to order in a lively exhibition kitchen. Featuring a wood-burning grill inspired by the many tastes of Italy, guests can enjoy signature dishes, including Chicken Bryan, Pollo Rosa Maria, Wood-Fire Grilled Steak and chops and classic Italian Pasta dishes in a welcoming, contemporary atmosphere. Managing Partner: Ana Guerrero Sr. Location: Off Rivers avenue right next to Northwoods Malll Instagram Facebook TikTok Our Story Get directions to Carrabba's Italian Grill at 2150 Northwoods Blvd North Charleston, SC Nearby Locations Carrabba's Italian Grill Murrell's Inlet, SC 11:00 AM - 10:00 PM 11:00 AM - 10:00 PM 11:00 AM - 10:00 PM 11:00 AM - 10:00 PM 11:00 AM - 10:00 PM 11:00 AM - 10:00 PM 11:00 AM - 10:00 PM 511 Courtfield Drive Murrell's Inlet , SC 29576 US phone (843) 652-3800 (843) 652-3800 Find a Location Get Directions
